Book Schedule

Date Deliverable Notes
Jan. 31, 2019 Abstract / Intro Many contributors have finished this already!
Feb. 28, 2019 Paper Outline Can be as minimal as a listing of the sections and a sentence on what each section will address. And of course it need not be final!
Aug. 1, 2019 Discussion Draft This need not be polished, might be missing references, etc. But it will allow the editors and other contributors to further evaluate how the various papers fit together and might converse with each other.
Oct. 15, 2019 Final draft We will then submit to Palgrave.
Jan. 1, 2020? Peer review completed Palgrave says this may take 2-3 months.
